LanguageData.FiBa.restart.label: Backstories will be generated during the next restart
LanguageData.FiBa.logging.label: Enable extra logging
LanguageData.FiBa.minimum.label: Minimum amount of backstories per spawncategory
LanguageData.FiBa.minimum.tooltip: A minimum of this many backstories will be generated for each spawncategory. 20 is standard but more can be needed if they are very specific.
